sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.CMDBDataManagerAjaxUtil</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>CMDBDataManagerAjaxUtil</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CMDBDataManagerAjaxUtil = Class.create();
CMDBDataManagerAjaxUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    type: 'CMDBDataManagerAjaxUtil',
    CMDB_POLICY_MANAGEMENT_TASK: 'cmdb_data_management_task',

    getPolicyTypeId: function() {
        var sysId = this.getParameter('sysId');
        var gr = new GlideRecordSecure(this.CMDB_POLICY_MANAGEMENT_TASK);
        if (gr.get(sysId))
            return gr.policy_id.cmdb_policy_type;

        return '';
    },

    getGroupsWithDMUserRole: function() {
        var groups = new CMDBDataManagerHelper().getDataManagerUserGroups();
        var groupIds = [];
        for (var i = 0; i < groups.length; i++) {
            groupIds.push(groups[i].value);
        }
		return groupIds;
    }

});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-03-29 17:52:27</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>581b379dffe20110456d766cf43bf16e</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>12</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CMDBDataManagerAjaxUtil</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="CMDB Data Manager" source="com.snc.cmdb.ci_lifecycle_manager">57bb78a43c35311068bcf327dfe37f17</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_581b379dffe20110456d766cf43bf16e</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-04-19 01:21:07</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
